about.title: üìã About me
about.userDescription: Hello, my name is Erick Nathan, I am a dedicated front-end developer, with extensive experience in technologies such as NodeJS and ReactJS, and a track record with notable clients such as Uber Chip, Correios Celular and Carrefour, specializing in robust and user-friendly solutions to the user, prioritizing scalability, accessibility and optimized performance.

projects.title: My projects
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I have worked on, you can find more on my

topics.favoriteSongs: My favorite songs in this moment

paragraphs.0: I've always been fascinated by technology and its power to shape the world around us. From a young age, I found myself drawn to the intricacies of coding and web development, spending countless hours experimenting with different programming languages and frameworks. What started as a hobby quickly evolved into a passion, leading me to pursue a career in front-end development.
paragraphs.1: Building on my skills and knowledge, I am currently thriving as a Front-end developer at Pagtel, where I am actively involved in creating intuitive and user-friendly interfaces for a variety of digital products for many clients like Uber, Correios, BMG Bank, Algar and Carrefour. My role allows me to combine my creative mindset with my technical expertise, enabling me to craft engaging and visually appealing experiences that resonate with users.

0.alt: Erick Nathan, a boy with curly hair, wearing a dark blue sweatshirt, in front of a computer with programming codes and a lot of spectators around him, the photograph contains a bluish tone from the lights of the event in the dark
0.legend: Me competing in Code In The Dark Brazil (jul. 2023)

paragraphs.0: I have a technical degree in systems development at Senai Jandira. My time at the organization allowed me to delve deeper into the theoretical aspects of programming, algorithms, and data structures, which laid a strong foundation for my career. I also had the opportunity to collaborate on exciting projects, such as my final project called Grati, a feedback management platform that allows organizations to adopt a feedback culture.
paragraphs.1: Continuing my studies, I am currently pursuing a degree in Analysis and Development of Systems at FIAP. During my first year, I collaborated on an impressive project named Easy Aluga, created for the BRQ Digital Solutions challenge in partnership with Easy Carros, focusing on vehicle rental services. This experience further enriched my practical understanding of software development and its application in real-world business scenarios.

0.alt: Several students and teacher wearing formal clothes.
0.legend: Graduating students of the systems development class at Senai Jandira during their graduation day. (jun. 2022)

1.legend: Grati's screenshots, a feedback management platform that allows organizations to adopt a feedback culture. (jun. 2022)

userData.name: Erick Nathan
userData.interests: Listen Music, Travel, Play Games and Watch Live Coding
userData.avatarAltDescription: A boy with curly hair smiling, wearing business clothes with a cyan tie.

easy-aluga.shortDescription: A white-label application to rent any vehicle, developed during the BRQ Easy Carros Challenge on FIAP.

stone-currency.shortDescription: Web application developed to facilitate the conversion of monetary values from US dollars to Brazilian reals.

3d-product-preview.shortDescription: A simple 3D sofa product previewer made with Svelte and Threlte, a ThreeJS library for Svelte.

devify.shortDescription: Web application to displays the song currently playing on my spotify account.

codeleap-network.shortDescription: CodeLeap Network is a social network application developed to manage posts on an API provided by CodeLeap.

igtimer.shortDescription: A project that allows the user to time their daily tasks, in addition to allowing them to see a history of all the tasks already carried out.

four-dev.shortDescription: A social network application for registering questionnaires, including functionalities for synthesizing knowledge in React with Typescript and Hooks, using TDD, Clean Architecture, Design Patterns and SOLID.

foodie.shortDescription: A landing page developed with HTML and CSS during the Marking Language classes at Senai.

tic-tac-toe.shortDescription: A simple tic tac toe game developed with HTML, CSS and Javascript during the Web Front-End Programming classes at Senai.
